name: KineticaRT V4
short_description:
KineticaRT allows you to build software instrumentation and control systems with fast screen updates, adaptable graphics and easy configuration. It supports simultaneous display and configuration while running. Using it, you can animate meters, gauges, trend graphs and many other items accurately and effectively.

KineticaRT achieves its principal design aims of speed and usability by means of configurable display objects - inherently faster than animated user-drawn graphics.

Easy to use on-line drawing and editing - shortens time from concept to completion KineticaRT's single combined development and run-time environment offers on-line screen modification - password protected to prevent unauthorised or accidental changes.
Immediate feedback of the effect of changes made during screen development.
No need to switch between edit and run-time sessions - improves productivity. 

Download and read the help file to learn more.
summary: Windows software for fast instrumentation and control systems
